subject: fix(ui): resolve 7 UX/UI issues found during review
body:
1. Node labels unreadable: Changed Cytoscape node label color from
   #1f2937 (near-black) to #e2e8f0 (light gray) so text is readable
   on the dark #0f172a canvas background.

2. btn-small class mismatch: DetailPanel used "btn-small" but CSS only
   defines "btn-sm". Renamed to btn-sm so property editor buttons
   (+ Add, Ã—) render with correct compact sizing.

3. Dead CSV CSS removed: Deleted ~110 lines of unused .import-csv-*
   and .csv-mapper-* styles left over from CSV import removal during
   Product Realignment.

4. Mobile menu touch-close: Added touchstart listener alongside
   mousedown so the hamburger dropdown closes when tapping outside
   on touch-only mobile devices.

5. Context menu off-screen: Added viewport bounds checking via ref
   callback that adjusts left/top when the menu would overflow the
   right or bottom viewport edge.

6. Arc creation UI: Added ConnectNodeModal with searchable node picker
   and optional relationship name. Accessible via "Connect to..." in
   the right-click/long-press context menu. Creates directed arc from
   source to selected target. Updated tutorial step 2 to reference
   the new connection flow.

7. Stale comment: Fixed App.tsx comment that still referenced
   "Upload/Query/Graph/Conventions" tabs (only Graph/Conventions exist).
